name: LimeTech Solutions
description: IT Support for SF High Tech Companies
overview:
LimeTech Solutions provides IT support services to high tech start-ups and SMBs in the SF Bay Area.

This company specializes in customized solutions to fit the unique needs of tech-savvy entrepreneurs and fast-growing companies. The LimeTech team serves companies with both Mac and PC environments and can also advise on open source and web-based solutions.

Founder Ihssan Abukhalaf has worked in the SF dot-com scene for over ten years and has built LimeTech Solutions on his reputation for dedicated customer support and technical know-how. He is backed up by the expertise of a team of experienced IT technicians.

LimeTech Solutions’ services include desktop and server support, infrastructure planning, office moves, product procurement, vendor negotiation, IT auditing, information security, compliance, and more.
